Description:
Improvement Notice I/HW/MWM/090322/01 (312361434) You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous parts of your Sahliner 3 roll bending machine (namely the counter rotating rollers).

Improvement Notice I/HW/MWM/090322/02 (312361522) You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous parts of your Pearson guillotine (namely the clamps and blade).
